channel.title: 1 extra Rune rock where should u put it ?!
channel.description:
You may choose a place for 1 extra rune rock
where should u put it !?
illegal : close to a bank close to a smithing oven
MUST BE in a non member area
~~jagex asked me to ask this question so thej can add it in rs2 ;D so REPLY !!!

item.title: 1 extra Rune rock where should u put it ?!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

I say one in the middle of the desert below al-kharid. I know the desert is a members area, but it would be a good location.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 extra Rune rock where should u put it ?!
item.dc:creator: @daraman2000 daraman2000
item.description:
@daraman2000 wrote:

First: never claim to be jagex because people will:

if playerClaimsToBeJagex() {
     spam();
     annoy();
     report();
}

Second: you’ve only been part of the community for ~3 1/2 months, while i’ve been part of the community for 4 months. sorry, you can’t fool me like that…

in these forums lying doesnt get you anywhere

Third: the wizzy tower is mysterious, ancient, and far away from a bank. crandor is also a good location, for obvious reasons.

Read full topic
